snippet: An initiative’s success is refueling a debate over whether cash bonuses can coax improved performance from teachers and students.
lead_paragraph: An initiative’s success is refueling a debate over whether cash bonuses can coax improved performance from teachers and students.

headline.main: Incentives for Advanced Work Let Pupils and Teachers Cash In
